parsed_email.subject: Eleoussa Voy.82 // Barranquilla for discharging - FW
parsed_email.body_text:
Message: 8471364
From: BMA Operations <operations@schaefer-bma.com>
To: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>,"eleoussa@vessels.astraship.com" <eleoussa@vessels.astraship.com>
Date: Thu, 15/Jan/2026 13:40:51 (UTC: +02:00)
Subject: Eleoussa Voy.82 // Barranquilla for discharging - FW

Dear Dimitra

Good day

 

m/v Eleoussa

---

We hereby confirm receipt of your message, thank you.

Will proceed with arrangements once vsl is berthed.

 

Best Regards

 

Wilfrido Daza

Operations

Schaefer BMA

O: +57 60 53 00 58 58

C: +57 32 15 41 35 41

www.schaefer-bma.com

operations@schaefer-bma.com

www.schaefergroup.com

 

A Schaefer Group Company

 

 

From: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 15, 2026 3:56 AM
To: BMA Operations <operations@schaefer-bma.com>; eleoussa@vessels.astraship.com
Subject: Eleoussa Voy.82 // Barranquilla for discharging - FW

 

Message Number: 769751

From: ops@astraship.com

To: Schaefer BMA Barranq (operations@schaefer-bma.com), eleoussa@vessels.astraship.com

Sent: Thursday, Jan 15, 2026 10:55 (UTC +02:00)

Subject: Eleoussa Voy.82 // Barranquilla for discharging - FW

 

Dear Wilfrido, 

 

Good Day.

 

Thank you for yours below which was well received and noted.

Please proceed with relevant arrangements for pipeline supply of abt 100mt FW upon vessel's berthing.

 

Dear Capt. Gleen, 

 

Please advise final quantity for FW supply.

 

Best Regards,
Dimitra Ioannidou
Operations Dept.

Astra Shipmanagement Inc
(as agents only)
6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece
Tel: +30 213 0175 106

_________________Original Message_________________

Message: 8467744

From: Schaefer BMA Barranq <BMA Operations <operations@schaefer-bma.com>>

Subject: Eleoussa Voy.82 // Barranquilla for discharging - FW

Date: January 14th 2026, 13:51:36

To: "eleoussa@vessels.astraship.com" <eleoussa@vessels.astraship.com>, Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>

 

 

Dear Dimitra

Good day

 

m/v Eleoussa

---

We acknowledge receipt of your message, well noted. Thank you.

Please note that fresh water supply at Barranquilla outer anchorage is not available.

At berth (SPRB Terminal) fresh water supply is available as follows:

  • Pipeline supply: USD 7,0 per MT subject to availability.
  • Truck supply: USD 19,0 per MT plus $120 port tax  (minimum order 10 MT.)

 

Let us know if any further information is required.

 

Best Regards

 

Wilfrido Daza

Operations

Schaefer BMA

O: +57 60 53 00 58 58

C: +57 32 15 41 35 41

www.schaefer-bma.com

operations@schaefer-bma.com

www.schaefergroup.com

 

A Schaefer Group Company

 

 

From: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 14, 2026 2:27 AM
To: BMA Operations <operations@schaefer-bma.com>; eleoussa@vessels.astraship.com
Subject: Eleoussa Voy.82 // Barranquilla for discharging - FW

 

Message Number: 769287

From: ops@astraship.com

To: Schaefer BMA Barranq (operations@schaefer-bma.com), eleoussa@vessels.astraship.com

Sent: Wednesday, Jan 14, 2026 9:26 (UTC +02:00)

Subject: Eleoussa Voy.82 // Barranquilla for discharging - FW

 

Dear Wilfrido, 

 

Good Day.

 

Please revert with availability and related expenses for the supply of FW at anchorage and at berth.

 

Awaiting yours.

 

Best Regards,
Dimitra Ioannidou
Operations Dept.

Astra Shipmanagement Inc
(as agents only)
6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece
Tel: +30 213 0175 106

Prioritizing the wellbeing of our planet and its people.

 

This email may contain confidential and privileged information. Use or disclosure of it by anyone other than an intended recipient is prohibited.
If you received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately by return email and destroy all copies of this email.

 

*Please consider the environment before printing*

classification.summary: This email is a forwarded message regarding the vessel Eleoussa's voyage 82 to Barranquilla for discharging. No specific husbandry service is requested or discussed in the visible content.
